name: Introduction to Cultural Studies
description: An introduction to the field of Cultural Studies and its major concepts, theories, and approaches.

name: Food Studies
description: An introduction to the study of food and its role in culture, including topics such as food production, distribution, consumption, and nutrition.

name: Food Politics and Policy
description: An exploration of the global political economy of food, including topics such as food security, food aid, and agricultural trade.

name: Global Food Systems
description: A study of the global food system, including topics such as the history, structure, and impacts of global food systems.

name: Food Culture and Society
description: An examination of the role of food in society, including topics such as food and identity, food and social structure, and food and global change.
